Items.Description: Sweeping Wind gains 2 stacks every second it does not deal damage to any enemies.

Items.Description: Reduce all damage taken by 6% for each stack of Soul Harvest you have.

Items.Name: Lamentation
Items.Description: Rend can now stack up to 2 times on an enemy.

Items.Name: Lefebvre's Soliloquy
Items.Description: Cyclone Strike reduces your damage taken by 50% for 5 seconds.

Items.Name: Leoric's Crown
Items.Description: Increase the effect of any gem socketed into this item by 100%.

Items.Name: Lut Socks
Items.Description: Leap can be cast up to three times within 2 seconds before the cooldown begins.

Items.Name: Madstone
Items.Description: Your Seven-Sided Strike applies Exploding Palm.

Items.Name: Mantle of Channeling
Items.Description: While channeling Whirlwind, Rapid Fire, Strafe, Tempest Rush, Firebats, Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost, you deal 25% increased damage and take 25% reduced damage.

Items.Name: Mask of Jeram
Items.Description: Pets deal 100% more damage.

Items.Name: Nemesis Bracers
Items.Description: Shrines and Pylons will spawn an enemy champion.

Items.Name: Nilfur's Boast
Items.Description: Increase the damage of Meteor by 200%. When your Meteor hits 3 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by 350%.

Items.Name: Omnislash
Items.Description: Slash attacks in all directions.

Items.Name: Omryn's Chain
Items.Description: Drop Caltrops when using Vault.

Items.Name: Pauldrons of the Skeleton King

Items.Name: Pinto's Pride
Items.Description: Wave of Light also Slows enemies by 80% for 3 seconds and deals 150% increased damage.

Items.Name: Pox Faulds

Items.Name: Pride of Cassius
Items.Description: Increases the duration of Ignore Pain by 6 seconds.

Items.Name: Pride's Fall
Items.Description: Your resource costs are reduced by 30% after not taking damage for 5 seconds.

Items.Name: Promise of Glory

Items.Name: Quetzalcoatl
Items.Description: Locust Swarm and Haunt now deal their damage in half of the normal duration.

Items.Name: Ranslor's Folly

Items.Name: Rivera Dancers

Items.Name: Sacred Harness
Items.Description: Judgment gains the effect of the Debilitate rune and is cast at your landing location when casting Falling Sword.

Items.Name: Sanguinary Vambraces
Items.Description: Chance on being hit to deal 1000% of your Thorns damage to nearby enemies.

Items.Name: Sash of Knives
Items.Description: With every attack, you throw a dagger at a nearby enemy for 650% weapon damage as Physical.

Items.Name: Sebor's Nightmare

Items.Name: Shi Mizu's Haori
Items.Description: While below 25% Life, all attacks are guaranteed Critical Hits.

Items.Name: Skular's Salvation
Items.Description: Increase the damage of Ancient Spear - Boulder Toss by 100%. When your Boulder Toss hits 5 or fewer enemies, the damage is increased by 150%.

Items.Name: Skull of Resonance

Items.Name: Spaulders of Zakara

Items.Name: Spirit Guards
Items.Description: Your Spirit Generators reduce your damage taken by 40% for 3 seconds.

Items.Name: St. Archew's Gage
Items.Description: The first time an elite pack damages you, gain an absorb shield equal to 150% of your maximum Life for 10 seconds.

Items.Name: Storm Crow
Items.Description: 40% chance to cast a fiery ball when attacking.

Items.Name: String of Ears
Items.Description: Reduces damage from melee attacks by 30%.

Items.Name: Strongarm Bracers
Items.Description: Enemies hit by knockbacks suffer 30% more damage for 6 seconds when they land.

Items.Name: Tasker and Theo
Items.Description: Increase attack speed of your pets by 50%.

Items.Name: The Cloak of the Garwulf

Items.Name: The Crudest Boots

Items.Name: Tiklandian Visage
Items.Description: Horrify causes you to Fear and Root enemies around you for 8 seconds.

Items.Description: You deal 100% increased damage against slowed enemies or triple this bonus against enemies afflicted by any other type of control-impairing effect..

Items.Name: Tzo Krin's Gaze

Items.Name: Vambraces of Sescheron

Items.Name: Visage of Giyua
Items.Description: Summon a Fetish Army after you kill 2 Elites.

Items.Description: Reduce the cooldown and increase the damage of Phalanx by 60%.

Items.Description: Every time you destroy a wreckable object, you gain a short burst of speed.

Items.Name: Wraps of Clarity
Items.Description: Your Hatred Generators reduce your damage taken by 35% for 5 seconds.

Items.Name: Zoey's Secret
Items.Description: You take 9.0% less damage for every Companion you have active.

Items.Name: Arcstone
Items.Description: Lightning pulses periodically between all wearers of this item, dealing 1500% weapon damage.

Items.Name: Band of Hollow Whispers
Items.Description: This ring occasionally haunts nearby enemies.

Items.Name: Band of the Rue Chambers
Items.Description: Your Spirit Generators generate 50% more Spirit.

Items.Description: After 5 consecutive non-critical hits, your chance to critically hit is increased to 100% for 3 seconds.

Items.Name: Dovu Energy Trap

Items.Description: Prevent all Cold damage taken and heal yourself for 15% of the amount prevented.

Items.Name: The Ess of Johan

• Ball Lighting travels at 30% speed.

Items.Name: Leger's Disdain

Items.Name: Moribund Gauntlets

Items.Name: Dayntee's Binding
Items.Description: You gain an additional 50% damage reduction when there is an enemy afflicted by your Decrepify..

Items.Name: Golemskin Breeches
Items.Description: Your Golem's damage is increased by 125% and you take 30% less damage while it is alive.

Items.Name: Golemskin Breeches
Items.Description: Your Bone Spirit's damage is increased by 100% for every second it is active.

Items.Name: Bryner's Journey
Items.Description: Attacking with Bone Spikes has a 30% chance to cast a Bone Nova at the target location.

Items.Name: Steuart's Greaves

Items.Name: Wisdom of Kalan
